nodes.text: The Commerce Concourse was located in Hreas Port City on the planet Lenthalis. Several groups of rioters—including swoop gangs, local youths, and criminal gangs—clashed on the Concourse armed with technology purchased from Galladinium's Galactic Datalog of Fantastic Technology, which had been banned in the Spirva sector by its Imperial Moff four months previously. Such weapons were smuggled in through the "Spirva Run."
